Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Prot. Dist. No. 6 -- 4.5 Mills - BOC - 10 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. 6 PROPOSITION

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 4.5 MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR MAINTAINING AND OPERATING FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES, PURCHASING FIRE FIGHTING EQUIPMENT AND OBTAINING WATER FOR FIRE PROTECTION PURPOSES.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 6 of the Parish of St. Landry, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of four and five tenths (4.5) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $72,600 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of maintaining and operating fire protection facilities, purchasing fire fighting equipment and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
